permissionTip.default: All members of the project can upload/download
permissionTip.strict: Manage permissions by first-level directory. Only users with permissions can upload/download
permissionTip.folder: Only the first-level directory is strictly authenticated, and all other directory project members can access it
permissionTip.public: No authentication required, any terminal can download
permissionTip.pipeline: Aligned with pipeline permissions, only this permission can upload/download/share products

ruleIgnoreRuleTypeTip:
Ignore: Vulnerability will be ignored if matching rule
Include: Vulnerability will be ignored if does not match rule
ruleIgnoreRiskyComponentPlaceholder: Risky component name, multiple component names were separated by newlines
ruleIgnoreRiskyComponentTip: The risky component should be filtered, multiple component names were separated by newlines
ruleIgnoreRiskyComponentVersionPlacehold: Vulnerable component version, separate multiple versions by line break
ruleIgnoreRiskyComponentVersionTip:
Versions of vulnerable components to be filtered, separated by space between component name and version range. Separate multiple version ranges of the same component by semicolon ';'. Version ranges are separated by comma ','. Separate multiple vulnerable components by line break. For example:
org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-core <=2.15.0
org.springframework.data:spring-data-commons >=1.13,<=1.13.10;>=2.0,<=2.0.5;>1.0,<1.13
